description.value: Your paradoxical nature has given you access to magic that isn't associated with your spellcasting tradition. You can have one spell in your spell repertoire (not one on your paradox's spell list) that isn't from your spellcasting tradition. Select this spell when you select this feat. You can cast that spell as a spell of your spellcasting tradition, and it becomes a signature spell. You can change the spell you choose when you gain a level.
